column3: â€œI love this strain. I was cleaning and organizing my house like crazy. Very talkative and energetic. Amazing day high.â€

â€œI was skeptical at first, as this strain's parents are both a bit heady, but I was immediately proven wrong.

Green Dream is what I've been looking for: cerebral without paranoia, light pain and anxiety relief without needing to take a nap, and an overall feeling of well-being.

I can still read and comprehend, but then analyze what I've read in an unconventional way. And most importantly I can hold a conversation wi...â€

â€œThis weed hits you harder/faster than any other weed i have tried. With it's deliciously sweet flavor, it explodes you into a long lasting, enjoyable experience. Use with caution beginners, very very potent.â€

â€œThis was my first Top shelf strain, I did this when i had a very low tolerance. 

Max Dose: Insanely lucid high. It is literally surreal. Sounds are amplified and clear, everything looks super hd and sharp, watching the lion king was akin to a trip on psychedelic drugs. Seeing as I did too much, I did end up having a bad trip, It felt like everything had a voice, I was seeing things, and my thoughts where very loud i...â€
â€œsmoked one bowl out of a pipe and it was dank. i had the mega muchies and they never ended, i ended up eating 300 dollars worth of foodâ€

â€œSo far, the best I have had yet, had a great night, so fun, just sat on the couch and spun my head, it felt like my neck was laffy taffy in one of the machines that spin it. I was like OOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHH(spin,spin) OOOOOHHHH.â€

â€œThis is probably one of my favourite sativa dominants i ever smoked. It gives you a very humourous and euphoric high. What i looked at was a very frosty and sticky beautiful looking weed. This is a very enjoyable high that you want to have when you are just hanging out wit...â€

â€œI'd put Green Dream between an 8 and a 9. Honestly the best bud I've gotten on my campus. Copped a dub and cyphed two joints in my bathroom between 5 people. As soon as everyone had at least one hit, we all looked at each other at the same time and started cracking up because we were already high from ONE HIT. It was pretty crazy. Green Dream is a gem if you want to get insta-high and if you want to save money on bud...â€

â€œI love blue dram and green crack so when they had a baby I was like Iâ€™ll give it a try and glad I did itâ€™s one of the most well rounded strain just enough sativa and indica. Great for any time of day morning or evening best for feeling happy doing work.â€

â€œone of my favorite strains. great head buzz that doesn't make you tired, with a crisp pine tree smell & taste! great for day time when you need to get some cleaning done!â€
â€œThis was a favorite in the fall for hiking and smoking in various forests. A nice high for being outside. The nugs were especially beautiful, very deep green and frosty <3â€

â€œGreen Dream is the child of two of my favorite strains: Blue Dream and Green Crack. So I was totally excited to try it, one night when I stumbled across it at my local pot store.
